SELECT d.id AS `doctorId`, d.doctor_name AS `doctorName`, d.doctor_img AS `doctorImg`, ( SELECT hospital_name FROM hospital_navigation_info WHERE id = d.hospital_id ) AS `hospitalName`, de.department_name as `departmentName`, ( SELECT professional_title_name FROM professional_title_info WHERE id = d.professional_id ) AS `professionalTitleName`, d.doctor_lable AS `doctorLable`, d.doctor_desc AS `doctorDesc` FROM doctors_info d JOIN department_info de ON d.department_id = de.id
1=1
and d.doctor_name like concat('%',#{doctorName},'%')
and de.id = #{departmentId}
